segments.text: The weather is really miserable . It has been raining hard all day long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think the rain is going to let up soon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . The rainy season will be over soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does the rainy season last ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can hardly stand these wet and cold days . It seems that it doesn't bother you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm used to this kind of days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Spring will come soon . And we will have some pleasant weather then .
segments.speaker: S2
